title: RTS Cartoon Environment
description: The RTS Cartoon Environment pack is an ensemble of 78 + assets dedicated to the creation of an awesome cartoon environment , perfect for creating RTS style game.
longDescription:
Preview: youtu.be/AteGLzkSHs0

Follow the development and ask your questions on Discord. https://discord.gg/fsC4YgB

The RTS Cartoon Environment pack is an ensemble of 78 + assets dedicated to the creation of an awesome cartoon environment , perfect for creating RTS style game.

Landscape : 18 Different material layers, allowing to paint any type of texture you want, create sand beach, grass, cavern, cliff, and much more easily. Flowers, grass, and small rocks are directly placed on the corresponding layers. Speeding up your creative process.

Trees : The trees are created to react to the players actions , Click on them to cut them , on mouse over they will shake gently.

Gold and Stone mines : Created in the same way that the trees, simulate mining action and destroy on click.

Blueprints spawning volume : Directly place any blueprints you want on the terrain layer you want, easily create your forest blueprints and place your resources.

With all these tools the creation of your next RTS scenario will be a matter of seconds!
technicalDetails:
All the assets and textures are designed to give you the best result while staying optimized.

• The scene is using Nanite/Lumen (Version UE5). You can easily enable and disable it as you want.

• The scene has been created for a all dynamic environment (days and night cycles) chopping the trees, etc, that won't work in a static environment. Thus, i created a static version of the skeletal meshes, and Lightmaps UVs . You decide how you want to use the assets.


What you get :

• A demo scene, to show what you can do.

• A Blueprints spawning volume. So you don't place all those Blueprints one by one.

• Terrain blended materials

• Automatic foliage placement on landscape layers

• LODs included

• Wind

• Work on mobile device too

All those assets :

• 3 Berry Bushes resources

• 6 Grounds flowers

• 4 Grass patches

• 6 types of mushrooms

• 6 types of water plants

• 2 Gold mines resources

• 2 Stone mines resources

• 4 Mountain Rocks

• One strange monolith (Get the reference)

• 18 Materials Layers (To paint every type of material you want )

• 6 Skeletal Oak Trees

• 6 Dead Trees

• 6 Pine Trees

• Moving clouds (mesh)


Update 4-26 :

• Added RVT support (4.26)

•General optimization /Performance improvements (switch from foliage static mesh to bp object on click)

•removed planar reflections.

•added ssgi instead of LPV

•General improvement to android version

Update UE5 :

Added Nanite support and Lumen.

Fixed various bugs.

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
Virtual Texturing and drop of LPV
Generals Optimizations
fps is more stable
static object switch to dynamic bp on click
